modShortDescription: Just a small mod that increases the number of skill points you get per level to 2. Customizable by changing the XML file.
modDescription:
Just a small mod that increases the number of [skill points](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-skill-points/) you get per level to 2\. Customizable by changing the XML file.

## Changelog

Updated for A20.

**[Download](https://apsnewcastle.com/AaronG85-UltimateProgression.rar)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/28338-aarong85s-a20-modlets/).
